documents.document: @pineyzb LOL. A real shite label for sure

My twitter/FB timeline suggest there aren't many protests in states that elected Trump. His supporters think he's doing good. #notasupporter

@carowriter @tferriss U r inspiring. Caroline. I grew up in NY & wanted to be fireman-ended up on rescue helicopter in New Zealand.

@BlackCapsNo1Fan @wellingtonista nope it is across from harvey norman
